results.title: Deutsch Direkt! [kit]
results.brief_description: The kit contains three audio-cassettes, a workbook and guide for teachers which can all be used in conjunction with the videorecorded course in simple German. The cassettes include some of the conversations from the video programs, with some pronunciation exercises. The books include language notes, exercises, background information, reading passages and progress checks as well as a handy reference section. Contents: 3 audio-cassettes, 2 books.

results.title: Deuce Bigalow male gigolo
results.creator_credit: Touchstone Pictures, Sid Ganis, Barry Bernardi and Mike Mitchell
results.brief_description: This low brow comedy from Saturday Night Live alumni Rob Schneider is about a luckless fish tank cleaner who gets mistaken for a male gigolo, and must grapple with the complications that mistaken identity brings. Jokes are mainly in the order of the scatological and deliberately offensive - following in the footsteps of Adam Sandler (who is executive producer) and the Farrelly brothers, although with decidedly less polish.

results.title: Detsvo Gorkovo = The Childhood of Maxim Gorky
results.brief_description:
The first part of a trilogy based on the memoirs of the writer Maxim Gorki dealing with early experiences that formed his outlook. This first part is constructed around Alexei’s (Gorki’s) observation of life with the grandparents that raised him. Although charged with a revolutionary romanticism and the lyrical spirit of the Volga this deeply humanist work is also recognised as a recreation of rural life in Czarist Russia. The characters are presented in terms of their ambitions and relationships within the family structure. Valeria Massilitinova is especially memorable as the grandmother. Also available on VHS and 16mm. Part 2 (My Apprenticeship) of the trilogy available on 16mm, 35mm and VHS. Part 3 (My Universities) available on 16mm and VHS. ‘The Gorky Trilogy’ available as one title on VHS.

Credits: Director, Mark Donskoi ; writers, Mark Donskoi, I. Gruzdev ; photographer, Pyotr Yermolov ; music, Lev Schwartz.
Cast: V. Massalitinova, M. Troyanovsky, A. Lyarsky.

results.title: Detour
results.creator_credit: Leon Fromkess, PRC Pictures and Edgar G. Ulmer
results.brief_description: When New York pianist Al Roberts (Tom Neal) embarks a transcontinental journey to join his girlfriend in Hollywood, he is overwhelmed by an intricate web of fate and circumstance. After trying to flee the accidental death of a driver who has given him a ride, Al steals the man’s car and his identity and continues towards Los Angeles only to be deterred by Vera (Ann Savage) who knows his secrets and how to exploit them.

results.title: Determination of molecular geometry: spectroscopic methods (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Barrie Whatley, BBC-TV and Open University
results.brief_description: Concerned with the use of absorbtion spectra data in the calculation of structural information such as bond lengths, bond angles and bond strengths. The emphasis in the program is on the electrical characteristics of molecules which absorb electro-magnetic radiation, and how absorbtion in the microwave and infra-red regions of the spectra can be related to motions of the individual molecules.

results.title: Deterioration of water
results.brief_description: Examines the phenomenon of polluted water by looking at sources of pollution; the role of the water cycle; methods of testing for pollutants; and purification method. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.

results.title: Detention
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
Four students are being kept in detention for one hour after school. They are bored and cannot wait to be allowed to leave. The clock ticks slowly on. Finally the clock strikes four and they are free to go.

results.title: Detective Blinky; Blink Bill's wedding picnic.
results.creator_credit: Yoram Gross and Yoram Gross Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Adventures of Blinky Bill”.
Two adventures with Australia’s most lovable Koala. “Detective Blinky”: Someone is stealing the berries from the town’s only Mulgaberry bush. Detective Blinky is on the case with Splodge to catch the culprit. “Blinky Bill’s wedding picnic”: Blinky’s mother and Nutsy’s father are getting married and a big celebration is planned. At the wedding picnic, everyone has a good time and the Dingos finally learn to live in harmony with everyone.

group.title: The Adventures of Blinky Bill
group.creator_credit: Yoram Gross and Yoram Gross Films

results.title: Detect and protect
results.brief_description: The basic elements of the drug story. How do you spot whether or not your child, or any other child is using drugs? What are the tell-tale emotional changes to watch for? What are the various types of drugs and which are the most dangerous? How do you protect the youngsters against becoming part of the drug scene> This film answers these questions simply.
